entry.title: Friday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
